## Dataset Overview

- **Dataset Name**: Smoking Prevalence Worldwide
- **Source**: World Health Organization (via World Bank)
- **Time Period**: 2000–2020
- **Population**: Adults aged 15 years and older
- **Variables**: Information about smoking prevalence across countries
- **Limitations**: Data gaps and irregular surveys may result in uncertainty.

## Variables

| **Variable Name** | **Description**                     | **Type**      | **Range/Values**       | **Missing Values** |
|--------------------|-------------------------------------|---------------|-------------------------|---------------------|
| `Entity`           | Country name                       | Categorical   | List of country names  | None               |
| `Code`             | ISO-3 country code                 | Categorical   | ISO-3 codes            | None               |
| `Year`             | Year of the record                 | Numeric       | 2000–2020              | None               |
| `Prevalence`       | Smoking prevalence (% of adults)   | Numeric       | 0.0–68.5               | `NA` for missing   |
